description: Information about the scale of the geographic extent.

scaleFactor.title: scaleFactor
scaleFactor.description: Scale of geographic extent expressed in a hardcopy map scale fraction (denominator).

measure.title: measure
measure.description: Scale of geographic extent expressed in ground distance parameters or angle.

levelOfDetail.title: levelOfDetail
levelOfDetail.description: A brief textual description of the spatial resolution of the resource

geographicResolution.description: The quantities of latitude and longitude which define the position of a point on the Earth's surface with respect to a reference spheroid.

latitudeResolution.description: The minimum difference between two adjacent latitude values expressed in Geographic Coordinate Units of measure.

longitudeResolution.description: The minimum difference between two adjacent longitude values expressed in Geographic Coordinate Units of measure.

unitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure used for the latitude and longitude values.

bearingDistanceResolution.description: The method of encoding the position of a point by measuring its distance and direction (azimuth angle) from another point.

distanceResolution.description: The minimum distance measurable between two points, expressed Planar Distance Units of measure.

distanceUnitOfMeasure.description: The units for the distance resolution.

bearingResolution.description: The minimum angle measurable between two points, expressed in Bearing Units of measure.

bearingUnitOfMeasure.description: The units of measure used for angles.

bearingReferenceMeridian.description: The axis from which the bearing is measured.

abscissaResolutionX.description: The (nominal) minimum distance between the 'x' or column values of two adjacent points, expressed in Planar Distance.

ordinateResolutionY.description: The (nominal) minimum distance between the 'y' or column values of two adjacent points, expressed in Planar Distance.
